title: Intrepid Canadian Rockies & Northern Lights
inclusions_evidence: Guided snowshoe hike on Top of the World

hotel.name_or_hint: Various hotels in Banff and surrounding areas

other.notes: Estimated costs for meals and activities based on average prices.

reasoning: The travel agency deal includes comprehensive meals, accommodation, and guided activities, which are more expensive when booked separately. The DIY total is significantly lower, but the value of included experiences justifies the agency's pricing.
